title: branch change
content: i have 9.2 cgpa can i get cs in rr

comments.body: Your chances depend on how many have scored better and how many empty seats are left. Without knowing at least one of these, its difficult to say. But going by usual trends, RR CS requires a 9.6+

Highly difficult but maybe possible with some freak luck

You will get absolutely anything else though
Good chances, but I fear its not good enough, as number of seats available would be in single digit and there are better gpa students too (willing to chance branch to cse rr campus)
